author's_name_(_зохиогч): W'A GINDRA LAKshIm PA TAD SIDDHI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021B (CES BKA' BSRUNG DAM CAN RGYA MTSO SDE TSAN RNAM LNGA'I MNGON RTOGS BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL DANG BCAS PA 'PHRIN LAS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MJUG GI BSTOD PA 'PHRIN BCOL GNYIS THO'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE'I MDZAD PA, GZHAN RNAMS GSAR BSGRIGS PA PHRAN BU YOD, 'DI NI RANG GI SLOB BU DGE SLONG GAR DBANG NOR BU BZANG POS LHA RDZAS BCAS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, RGYAL KHANG RTZE BA SKU PHRENG BRGYAD PA RTA MGRIN BADZRA DPAL BZANG PO'I DNGOS SLOB RNAMS KYI BKA' 'BANGS @022A *, ,THA SHAL BA, ^RGYAL KHAMS PA MANG DU THOS PA'I SNGAGS RAMS PA W'A GINDRA LAKshIm PA TAD SIDDHIS SNGON GYI MKHAS PA RNAMS KYI GSUNGS JI LTA BA BZLOS BZHIN DU RANG ZHE BCU DRUG GI THOG TU 'BRUG LOR ZLA TSES DGE BAR GRVA TSANG BKRA SHIS GLING GI NYE 'DAB SU BSGRIGS PA'I, ,YI GE PA NI SLOB BU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG GIS SO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO YON LA PHAN THOG PA DANG DAD LDAN DAM TSIG CAN RNAMS KYI 'PHRIN LAS TSUL BZHIN DU SGRUB CING MTHAR THUG BZUNG 'JUG THOB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
